macronutrients.name: Carbo
macronutrients.description: Carbohydrates are the body's primary source of energy. They include sugars, starches, and fiber.

macronutrients.name: Protein
macronutrients.description: Proteins are essential for building and repairing tissues in the body. They are made up of amino acids.

macronutrients.name: Fat
macronutrients.description: Fats are important for energy storage, insulation, and cushioning organs. They can be saturated or unsaturated.
